title.rendered: 3 Nights 4 Days Ujjain Mahakaleshwar Tour Package

content.rendered:
Table of Contents

  • Essential Tips for 3 Nights 4 Days Ujjain Mahakaleshwar Tour Package
  • Elevate Your Wonderful Experiences of 3 Nights 4 Days Ujjain Mahakaleshwar Tour Package
  • Itinerary for 3 Nights 4 Days Ujjain Mahakaleshwar Tour Package

Ujjain, with its rich cultural heritage and deep spiritual significance, stands as one of the holiest cities in India, drawing devotees and travelers alike to its sacred sites and serene ambiance.

Situated on the banks of the revered Shipra River, Ujjain is famed for its association with Hindu mythology and is believed to be one of the seven holiest places for Hindus. The city is home to the Mahakaleshwar Jyotirlinga, one of the twelve Jyotirlingas, where Lord Shiva is worshipped fervently by pilgrims seeking spiritual solace.

Omkareshwar, nestled on the banks of the Narmada River, is another significant pilgrimage destination, revered as one of the twelve sacred Jyotirlinga shrines dedicated to Lord Shiva.

Maheshwar, located on the banks of the majestic Narmada River, exudes an aura of timeless charm and spiritual serenity. The city is renowned for its ancient temples, ghats, and architectural marvels, reflecting the grandeur of its glorious past.

In Ujjain, indulge in moments of leisure, whether strolling through bustling markets teeming with vibrant hues and fragrant spices or savoring the flavors of local cuisine that tantalize the taste buds and nourish the soul.

As your pilgrimage draws to a close, carry with you the blessings bestowed upon you during your sojourn in Ujjain and Mahakaleshwar. Though your physical journey may end, the spiritual resonance of this sacred land will continue to echo within your heart, beckoning you to return and embark on yet another transformative voyage.

A 3 Nights 4 Days Ujjain Mahakaleshwar Tour Package would typically cover significant religious and cultural sites in the Ujjain and Mahakaleshwar region. Here’s a sample itinerary:

Elevate Your Wonderful Experiences of 3 Nights 4 Days Ujjain Mahakaleshwar Tour Package

Choose our 3 Nights 4 Days Ujjain Mahakaleshwar Tour Package to explore the grandeur and charm of this incredible state.

Itinerary for 3 Nights 4 Days Ujjain Mahakaleshwar Tour Package

DAY 1

Arrival & visit to Maheshwar

  • Arrival, pickup & drive to your hotel at Indore.
  • Checkin at your hotel on reaching & freshen up.
  • Drive to Maheshwar & visit Maheshwar Temple & Fort on the banks of Narmada.
  • Overnight stay at Indore.

DAY 2

Drive to Ujjain & Darshan

  • Early morning, embark on a scenic drive to Ujjain.
  • Visit the famous Mahakaleshwar Temple, one of the twelve Jyotirlingas, dedicated to Lord Shiva.
  • Explore other significant attractions in Ujjain such as the Sandipani Maharishi Ashram & Kal Bhairav Temple.
  • Visit Harsiddhi Temple & Iskcon Temple.
  • Overnight stay at Indore.

DAY 3

Drive to Omkareshwar & Darshan

  • Early morning, head towards Omkareshwar.
  • Visit the Omkareshwar Temple, another one of the twelve revered Jyotirlingas, located on an island in the Narmada River.
  • Enjoy the serene atmosphere and the spiritual vibes of Omkareshwar.
  • Visit Mamleshwar Temple, another historic temple dedicated to Lord Shiva. Then visit Shani Temple.
  • Overnight stay at Indore.

DAY 4

Indore Sightseeing & Departure

  • After breakfast, checkout & proceed to visit Khajrana Ganesh Temple, Annapurna Temple & Kanch Mandir.
  • Then visit Lalbagh Palace & Rajwada Palace, then visit Bada Ganpati Temple.
  • Drive to Indore Airport for your drop.

Inclusions

  • 3 Night Accommodation
  • Breakfast at Hotel
  • All Toll and Parking included
  • All Transfers and Sightseeing as per Itinerary
